testcase.name: Successfully create a new letterhead with images and formatting
testcase.system-out: Given the admin is logged into the application for letterhead creation......passed When the admin navigates to the letterhead management section for creation..passed And the admin clicks the Add New button for letterhead creation.............passed And the admin enters a unique letterhead name for creation..................passed And the admin enters header margin as "50" for letterhead...................passed And the admin enters footer margin as "40" for letterhead...................passed And the admin uploads the letterhead image file for creation................passed And the admin uploads the signature image file for creation.................passed And the admin enters signature width as "150" for letterhead................passed And the admin enters signature height as "50" for letterhead................passed And the admin clicks the Submit button for new letterhead creation..........passed Then the new letterhead should be created successfully......................passed
